original_text: then the sword that you fear shall overtake you there in the land of Egypt, and the famine of which you are afraid shall follow close after you to Egypt, and there you shall die.
korean_text: 너희가 두려워하는 칼이 애굽 땅으로 따라가서 너희에게 미칠 것이요 너희가 두려워하는 기근이 애굽으로 급히 따라가서 너희에게 임하리니 너희가 거기에서 죽을 것이라

sentences.original_text: then the sword that you fear
shall overtake you there in the land of Egypt
and the famine of which you are afraid
shall follow close after you to Egypt
